LOL!!!!!

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Kristin Morris 
  To: EVP=
-ITC@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Thursday, May 21, 2009 9:15 AM
  Subject: RE:=
 [EVP-ITC] Re: Ebay auction for sorta Frank's Box?






  "Leave the gun. =
Take the cannoli."




----------------------------------------------------=
--------------------------

  From: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com [mailto:EVP-ITC=
@yahoogroups.com] On Behalf Of April Abercrombie
  Sent: Thursday, May 21, =
2009 10:10 AM
  To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
  Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: Eb=
ay auction for sorta Frank's Box?








  You want we should whack 'im Fr=
ank??



    ----- Original Message ----- 

    From: Frank Sumption 

    =
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com 

    Sent: Thursday, May 21, 2009 9:05 AM

   =
 Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: Ebay auction for sorta Frank's Box?



     Sam=
e old crap, these self proclaimed experts have no idea what they are talkin=
g about! It's not the selling of boxes that gets me, it's the description o=
f how it works--friggin' clueless! "The Box" does not generate white noise =
that allows spirits to create voices, the entities use the bits of speech, =
and music to form voices! You're supposed to believe these people are "prof=
essional investigators", yet they can't even get the simplest concept. When=
 I speak up, I'm the one being mean and negative. 



     "Experts"! forge=
t the tired old way of recording EVP, white noise is not needed, and is a r=
eal pain to listen to. White noise was just an early attempt to provide a r=
aw audio, in the early days, but it was piss poor at best! Forget that crap=
, you need something that provides human speech bits, and frequencies. Of c=
ourse you can get direct direct recordings without noise or raw audio, but-=
--it tends to be weak noise that most of time are questionable. 



     So=
 just for the record, the box functions by sweeping a radio across it's tun=
ing range, the resulting bits of human specch, music and noise is referred =
to as raw audio, which the entities rearrange, or re-modualte to form meani=
ngful messages. EVPmaker provides this raw audio by chopping up pre-recorde=
d SPEECH, stored as a .wav file, then playing this audio through the comput=
er speakers while recording the result at the same time. EVPmaker does not =
create white noise either.



     Frank-S

    On Thu, May 21, 2009 at 8:2=
5 AM, April Abercrombie <april@...> wrote:



    =
Ok-found the "Report This Item" link. But there is no option for untrue adv=
ertising. So I guess eBay doesn't think that is a big enough offense.



  =
  Someone could contact the seller and tell him then they know it isn't tru=
e. I don't feel qualified to do so since I only know Frank from this list, =
and I have only been on this list a short time.



    It may not do any go=
od, but maybe it will.





      ----- Original Message ----- 

      From=
: April Abercrombie 

      To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com 

      Sent: Thurs=
day, May 21, 2009 8:09 AM

      Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: Ebay auction fo=
r sorta Frank's Box?



      Yes...I know.... but it is fun to fantasize. =
Plus, if I am in a position to make a difference I will. The problem is kno=
wing when or where that position is.



        ----- Original Message ----=
- 

        From: Kristin Morris 

        To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com 

  =
      Sent: Thursday, May 21, 2009 7:56 AM

        Subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] =
Re: Ebay auction for sorta Frank's Box?



        We can't police the enti=
re internet.  People should take responsibility for themselves and do some =
research and find out how this works before they purchase.  

        Cavea=
t emptor..  


------------------------------------------------------------=
------------

        From: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com [mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogr=
oups.com] On Behalf Of April Abercrombie
        Sent: Thursday, May 21, 20=
09 8:45 AM
        To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
        Subject: Re: [EVP-IT=
C] Re: Ebay auction for sorta Frank's Box?





        Exactly! That's wha=
t I'm sayin'.

        Wouldn't it be a hoot if Frank himself blasted the g=
uy. But that isn't the mature way..... ;)

          ----- Original Message=
 ----- 

          From: threadsintyme@... 

          To: EVP-ITC@yah=
oogroups.com 

          Sent: Thursday, May 21, 2009 5:52 AM

          Su=
bject: RE: [EVP-ITC] Re: Ebay auction for sorta Frank's Box?

          Why=
 don't some of us respond to his ad...and take serious issue with this busi=
ness of his lying to the public about Frank? 

          That info is a ser=
ious breach of eBay policy. He could be banned from eBay for life. 
       =
   Al
          ---------- Original Message ----------
          From: "Kri=
stin Morris" <ckmorris95@...>
          To: <EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.=
com>
          Subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] Re: Ebay auction for sorta Frank's Bo=
x?
          Date: Thu, 21 May 2009 06:16:27 -0500

          WOW.. Frank. =
 I didn't realize you were charging - and "thousands of dollars" to boot!  =
Must be to pay for that Faraday Cage and the white noise generator thing th=
is yahoo believes are in all your creations.  And hurry because "his suppli=
er" (cough - cough Radio Shack) is discontinuing!  But no worries he has "s=
old over 2 dozen of these 'Frank's Boxes devices" so he must be legit becau=
se he knows - and actual customer bought a 'real' Frank's Box and said it w=
as equal!  Awesome.

          k


----------------------------------------=
------------------------------

          From: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com [ma=
ilto:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com] On Behalf Of ourobouros2k2
          Sent: Th=
ursday, May 21, 2009 12:50 AM
          To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
       =
   Subject: [EVP-ITC] Re: Ebay auction for sorta Frank's Box?






       =
   Been following this unprofessional idiot's items for awhile now. I love =
how he says that Frank charges thousands of dollars for an original Frank's=
 box. 

          This dude is the worst type of con, preying on people who=
 know only enough to be familiar with the term Frank's box. Then again, it =
always has bothered me when people take shack hacks and charge stupid price=
s for them on ebay under the Frank's box moniker.

          This guy is ba=
sed out of Nevada I believe, and his group's ethics leave little to be desi=
red. Takes all kinds, I reckon...

          Andy

          --- In EVP-ITC=
@yahoogroups.com, Aquarius <laustin@...> wrote:
          >
          > Hmm=
m... saw this on Ebay tonight... you've got to read all the text to hear
  =
        > how he describes what he's selling. 
          > 
          > Do =
any of you on this list know who he is? I just thought this was kind of
   =
       > interesting... see:
          > 
          > http://tinyurl.com/o5=
pper
          > 
          > Cheers,
          > 
          > Leslie, cons=
istent lurker and occasional poster <g>
          > 
          > "I'm not h=
appy, I'm cheerful. There's a difference. A happy woman has no
          > =
cares at all. A cheerful woman has cares but has learned how to deal with t=
hem."
          > 
          > -- Beverly Sills (1929-) American Opera Sing=
er
          >
